邯.definition: name of a district in Hebei

邯山.definition: Hanshan district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei

邯山區.definition: Hanshan district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei

邯鄲.definition: see 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2dan1 Shi4]

邯鄲學步.definition: to copy the way they walk in Handan (idiom); slavishly copying others, one risks becoming a caricature

邯鄲市.definition: Handan, prefecture-level city in Hebei Province 河北省[He2bei3 Sheng3]
